name: Bicyclism EP
description: Bicyclism EP is a physics based party game for up to 4 split-screen players. Play as your favorite bicycle and compete in traditional bicycle games like racing, jousting, soccer, space mushroom hunting, wrestling, etc.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Intel i5 2.3Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel i7 2.3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750m DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 400 MB available space
